ghost

Class Fruit

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Fruit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Soda, SuperFruit

    public class Fruit
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a kind of fruit class that will be eaten by ghosts.

      • isExist

        public boolean isExist()
        Whether this fruit is eaten.
        Returns:
        Whether this fruit is eaten. If it is eaten, return false. Otherwise, return true.

      • drawFruits

        public static void drawFruits(processing.core.PApplet app,
                              Player player,
                              java.util.List<Fruit> allFruits,
                              java.util.List<Chaser> allGhosts,
                              int frameCount)
        Draw all fruits including super fruits.
        Parameters:
        app - An object of App class which is a subclass of PApplet.
        player - An object of Player class.
        allFruits - The list of all fruits.
        allGhosts - A list of all ghosts.
        frameCount - The number of current frame.
